segments.text: Excuse me . You can't leave your car here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , but I Just want to pick up a package . It won't take long .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid you'll have to find a parking meter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I park here just for a second ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , sir . I'm sorry you can't .
segments.speaker: S1
